name: CITY OF ST. LOUIS
sampleDescriptions: Continue work with delegation to include language to allow greater flexibility in how HUD funds can be utilized by public housing agencies in FY 2018 THUD appropriation bills.
Monitor Administration implementation of tax reform bill.
Monitor Clean Air act regulations and new non-attainment areas; also discuss 2018 Water Resources proposals.
Monitor FY 2019 Appropriations proposals.  Advocate for programs of importance to local governments, with focus on housing and funding to fight addiction epidemic.
